skyforge.GovernancePolicy.description: All limits are optional. A value of 0 means "unlimited/disabled".

allowCustomTemplateRepos.description: This is distinct from "external" because "custom" can reference arbitrary repos and is therefore riskier.
allowCustomTemplateRepos.title:
AllowCustomTemplateRepos controls whether non-admin users may use template
source = custom.

allowUserByosContainerlabServers.title:
AllowUserByosContainerlabServers controls whether non-admin users may use
user-scoped Containerlab BYOS servers (user:... refs).

allowUserByosNetlabServers.title:
AllowUserByosNetlabServers controls whether non-admin users may use user-scoped
Netlab BYOS servers (user:... refs).

allowUserExternalTemplateRepos.title:
AllowUserExternalTemplateRepos controls whether non-admin users may use template
source = external (user-scoped external repos).

maxCollectorsPerUser.title:
MaxCollectorsPerUser caps the number of in-cluster Forward collectors a user can
create.

maxDeploymentsPerUser.title:
MaxDeploymentsPerUser caps the number of deployment definitions a user can
create across all accounts.

skyforge.GovernancePolicy.title: GovernancePolicy is a lightweight guardrail layer (admin-configurable).

skyforge.SkyforgeProject.description: NOTE: This type must live in the service package (not a type alias to an internal package) to satisfy Encore's API schema rules.

allowCustomEveServers.title:
EVE-NG deployments require an endpoint. This flag enables configuring a
per-account EVE server.

skyforge.SkyforgeProject.title:
SkyforgeProject is the user-facing account object stored in Postgres and
returned by the API.

get.summary: FrontendAdmin serves the SPA for admin routes.

delete.summary:
AccountProxyDelete forwards account-scoped DELETE requests to default-account
handlers.

get.summary:
AccountProxyGet forwards account-scoped GET requests to default-account
handlers.

head.summary:
AccountProxyHead forwards account-scoped HEAD requests to default-account
handlers.

post.summary:
AccountProxyPost forwards account-scoped POST requests to default-account
handlers.

put.summary:
AccountProxyPut forwards account-scoped PUT requests to default-account
handlers.

get.summary: GetProjects returns accounts visible to the authenticated user.

allowCustomEveServers.title:
EVE-NG deployments require an endpoint. This flag enables configuring a
per-account EVE server.

post.summary: CreateProject provisions a new Skyforge account.

get.description: Query params: - all=true (admin only; default false)
get.summary: ProjectsEvents streams the account list as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

delete.summary: DeleteProject deletes a account and its backing resources.

get.summary: ListProjectArtifacts lists artifact objects for a account.
DownloadProjectArtifact returns a presigned download redirect for the artifact.

post.summary:
CreateProjectArtifactFolder creates a "folder" placeholder (zero-byte object
with trailing slash).

delete.summary: DeleteProjectArtifactObject deletes a single artifact object.

post.description: This is an object-store-native alternative to the legacy \`UploadProjectArtifact\` endpoint (which uses Encore's objects SDK and may require bucket subdomain DNS).
post.summary: PutProjectArtifactObject writes/overwrites a single artifact object.
UploadProjectArtifact uploads or presigns an artifact to the account's bucket.

delete.summary: DeleteProjectAWSStatic clears AWS static credentials.

put.summary: PutProjectAWSStatic stores AWS static credentials.

delete.summary: DeleteProjectGCPCredentials clears GCP credentials.

get.summary: GetProjectGCPCredentials returns GCP service account status.

put.summary: PutProjectGCPCredentials stores GCP service account JSON.

account/blueprints/external repo.

For this endpoint, TemplatesDir must be under "containerlab/".

SaveContainerlabTopologyYAML writes a containerlab topology YAML into the user's
account repo so it can be

get.summary: ListProjectDeployments lists deployment definitions for a account.

post.description: (no YAML commit step).

autoDeploy.title: AutoDeploy queues an initial "create" action after creating the deployment.

name.title: Name becomes the Skyforge deployment name (and drives the lab name).

template.title: Template is the filename under TemplatesDir.

templateSource.description: For now, only "account" (legacy: "account") is supported by this endpoint.

pointing at an existing account template YAML

creates a "clabernetes" deployment referencing that template, and (optionally) queues an initial deploy.

CreateClabernetesDeploymentFromYAML persists a containerlab topology YAML into

deployment pointing at an existing account template YAML

name).

CreateContainerlabDeploymentFromYAML persists a containerlab topology YAML into

parameters.description: Alternate casing used by some UI clients.
parameters.name: forwardDelete

delete.summary: DeleteProjectDeployment removes a deployment definition from Skyforge.

put.summary: UpdateProjectDeployment updates an existing deployment definition.

post.summary: RunProjectDeploymentAction runs a deployment operation with consistent UX verbs.

get.description: Intended for top growers views (week-over-week, day-over-day) without pulling Forward time series.
get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentCapacityGrowth compares the latest rollup bucket to an
earlier one and returns deltas.

GetProjectDeploymentCapacityInventory returns the latest cached NQE results for
inventory/routing scale.

GetProjectDeploymentCapacityDeviceMetrics proxies Forward's device-metrics
endpoint.

post.summary:
PostProjectDeploymentCapacityDeviceMetricsHistory proxies Forward's
device-metrics-history endpoint.

get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentCapacityInterfaceMetrics proxies Forward's interface-metrics
endpoint.

post.summary:
PostProjectDeploymentCapacityInterfaceMetricsHistory proxies Forward's
interface-metrics-history endpoint.

get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentCapacityUnhealthyDevices proxies Forward's unhealthy-devices
endpoint.

post.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentCapacityUnhealthyInterfaces proxies Forward's
unhealthy-interfaces endpoint.

deploymentId.description: Defaults to the deployment id in the path.
deploymentId.title: Optional override; primarily for debugging.

post.summary:
RefreshProjectDeploymentCapacityRollups enqueues a background rollup task for
the deployment.

get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentCapacitySummary returns the latest stored capacity rollups
for a deployment.

post.summary: DestroyProjectDeployment triggers a destructive run (destroy) for a deployment.

put.summary:
UpdateProjectDeploymentForwardConfig updates the per-deployment Forward toggle
and collector selection.

post.summary:
SyncProjectDeploymentForward enqueues a Forward sync task for the deployment's
latest topology.

get.description: For Netlab deployments, this executes \`netlab status\` against the associated Netlab API and returns the output.
get.summary: GetProjectDeploymentInfo returns provider-specific info for a deployment.

GetProjectDeploymentInventory returns a simple inventory of nodes and management
IPs.

post.summary:
UpdateProjectDeploymentLinkAdmin performs administrative link operations
(up/down) on a topology edge.

CaptureProjectDeploymentLinkPcap captures a short pcap on a topology link and
uploads it as a account artifact.

post.description: The impairment is applied "outside" of the network OS by executing \`tc\` in the clabernetes launcher container (or another non-NOS container in the same pod netns).
post.summary:
SetProjectDeploymentLinkImpairment applies or clears traffic impairment settings
for a single link.

get.description: This is used to render live link utilization on the topology graph (similar to c9s VSCode extension).
get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentLinkStats returns a snapshot of interface counters for each
topology edge.
GetProjectDeploymentLinkStatsEvents streams link stats snapshots as SSE.

GetProjectDeploymentNetlabGraph returns a rendered netlab topology graph for a
deployment.

post.description: This is an alternative to local SSH ProxyJump when clients can't reach the lab network.
post.summary:
NetlabConnect executes `netlab connect` on the Netlab runner host and returns
its output.

get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentNodeDescribe returns a lightweight summary of the
clabernetes node pod.

GetProjectDeploymentNodeInterfaces returns interface stats (launcher container)
for a clabernetes node.

get.description: This powers the "View logs" action in the topology UI (similar to the c9s VSCode extension).
get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentNodeLogs returns recent log lines for a clabernetes node
pod.

get.description: Currently supports EOS/cEOS via \`Cli -c "show running-config"\`.
get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentNodeRunningConfig fetches the running config from a NOS node
(best-effort).

post.description: For EOS/cEOS, this runs \`write memory\`.
post.summary:
SaveProjectDeploymentNodeConfig triggers a best-effort "save config" operation
on a node.
StartProjectDeployment starts a deployment run.
StopProjectDeployment attempts to stop the most recent task for this deployment.

get.description:
using Kubernetes \`pods/exec\` (SPDY) and a WebSocket transport to the browser.

Query params: - node: required (clabernetes/topologyNode) - container: optional - command: optional (defaults to "sh"; for EOS nodes use "Cli")
get.summary:
TerminalExecWS provides an interactive in-browser terminal into
clabernetes-backed nodes

get.description: For containerlab, the topology is sourced from the containerlab API after deploy so we can reflect the resolved management IPs.
get.summary:
GetProjectDeploymentTopology returns a lightweight, provider-derived topology
view.
ListProjectDeploymentUIEvents returns recent UI/graph events for a deployment.
DeploymentUIEventsStream streams deployment UI events as SSE.

post.summary: ConvertProjectEveLab exports an EVE-NG lab into a Containerlab template.
ImportProjectEveLab registers an existing EVE-NG lab as a deployment.

get.summary: ListProjectEveLabs returns EVE-NG labs for import.

ListProjectEveServers returns the configured EVE-NG API endpoints for this
account.

delete.summary: DeleteProjectEveServer deletes a account-scoped EVE-NG server.

delete.summary:
DeleteProjectForwardNetwork deletes a saved Forward network (by uuid id or by
forwardNetworkId).

GetProjectForwardNetworkCapacityGrowth compares the latest rollup bucket to an
earlier one and returns deltas.

for inventory/routing scale.

device-metrics-history endpoint.

GetProjectForwardNetworkCapacityUnhealthyDevices proxies Forward's
unhealthy-devices endpoint.

PostProjectForwardNetworkCapacityUnhealthyInterfaces proxies Forward's
unhealthy-interfaces endpoint.

RefreshProjectForwardNetworkCapacityRollups enqueues a background rollup task
for the saved Forward network.

GetProjectForwardNetworkCapacitySummary returns the latest stored capacity
rollups for a saved Forward network.

delete.summary: DeleteProjectForwardConfig removes Forward Networks credentials for a account.

get.summary: GetProjectForwardConfig returns Forward Networks credentials for a account.

post.summary:
PostProjectForwardConfig stores Forward Networks credentials for a account (POST
fallback).

put.summary: PutProjectForwardConfig stores Forward Networks credentials for a account.

get.summary: GetProjectForwardCollectors lists available Forward collectors for the account.

post.summary: CreateProjectForwardCollector creates a Forward collector for the account.

allowCustomEveServers.title:
EVE-NG deployments require an endpoint. This flag enables configuring a
per-account EVE server.

put.summary: UpdateProjectMembers updates account visibility and settings.

get.summary: GetProjectNetlab returns the account's netlab server selection.

allowCustomEveServers.title:
EVE-NG deployments require an endpoint. This flag enables configuring a
per-account EVE server.

put.summary: UpdateProjectNetlab updates the account's netlab server selection.

get.summary:
ListProjectNetlabServers returns the configured Netlab API endpoints for this
account.

put.summary:
UpsertProjectNetlabServer creates or updates a account-scoped Netlab API
endpoint.

delete.summary: DeleteProjectNetlabServer deletes a account-scoped Netlab server.

get.summary:
GetProjectNetlabServerHealth checks the health of a account-scoped Netlab API
server.

get.description: This powers "View template" in the deployment creation flow.

parameters.description: repo-relative file within Dir (may include subdirs)
parameters.name: template

get.summary:
GetProjectNetlabTemplate reads a netlab YAML template from a
account/blueprints/external repo.
GetProjectNetlabTemplates lists Netlab templates for a account.

post.description: This catches missing images, invalid attributes, and missing required plugins/templates.

setOverrides.description: They are only used by the in-cluster netlab generator (netlab-c9s), not BYOS netlab.
setOverrides.title:
SetOverrides are netlab CLI `--set` overrides (highest precedence) applied
during validation.

template.title: repo-relative file within Dir (may include subdirs)

post.summary:
ValidateProjectNetlabTemplate runs `netlab create` against a selected template
bundle without deploying it.

get.summary: GetProjectPolicyReportCatalog returns the embedded Policy Reports check catalog.

post.description: This endpoint is intentionally stubbed for now. Earlier iterations depended on fast-changing NQE output shapes and would become brittle quickly.
post.summary:
SimulateProjectPolicyReportChangePlanning simulates a rule change against a set
of flows (no config push).

get.summary: GetProjectPolicyReportChecks lists known checks (catalog + embedded .nqe files).

post.summary:
RunProjectPolicyReportCheck executes an embedded check (.nqe) and returns a
normalized response.

get.summary: GetProjectPolicyReportCheck returns the .nqe file content for a given check.
ListProjectPolicyReportRecertAssignments lists assignments.

post.summary: AttestProjectPolicyReportRecertAssignment marks an assignment as attested.
WaiveProjectPolicyReportRecertAssignment marks an assignment as waived.

get.summary: ListProjectPolicyReportRecertCampaigns lists recertification campaigns.

post.summary:
CreateProjectPolicyReportRecertCampaign creates a recertification campaign for a
given Forward network/snapshot/pack.

get.summary: GetProjectPolicyReportRecertCampaign gets one campaign plus assignment counts.

post.summary:
GenerateProjectPolicyReportRecertAssignments runs the campaign pack and stores
resulting findings as assignments.

get.summary: ListProjectPolicyReportExceptions lists exceptions.

post.summary: CreateProjectPolicyReportException proposes an exception for a finding.
ApproveProjectPolicyReportException approves an exception (owner/admin only).
RejectProjectPolicyReportException rejects an exception (owner/admin only).

get.summary:
ListProjectPolicyReportForwardNetworks lists saved Forward networks for Policy
Reports.

post.summary:
CreateProjectPolicyReportForwardNetwork stores a Forward network id for Policy
Reports.

delete.summary:
DeleteProjectPolicyReportForwardNetworkCredentials clears the current user's
credentials for a Forward network.

get.summary:
GetProjectPolicyReportForwardNetworkCredentials returns the current user's
credentials status for a Forward network.

put.summary:
PutProjectPolicyReportForwardNetworkCredentials upserts the current user's
credentials for a Forward network.

delete.summary:
DeleteProjectPolicyReportForwardNetwork deletes a saved Forward network (by uuid
id or by forwardNetworkId).

post.summary:
RunProjectPolicyReportNQE executes an NQE query and returns a normalized
response.

get.summary:
GetProjectPolicyReportPacks returns the embedded Policy Reports packs
definition.

post.summary:
RunProjectPolicyReportPackDelta runs a pack on two snapshots and returns a
per-check delta summary.

RunProjectPolicyReportPack executes all checks in a pack (serially) and returns
per-check results.

get.summary: GetProjectPolicyReportSnapshots lists snapshots for a Forward network.

post.summary: RunProjectAnsible triggers an ansible run for a account.
RunProjectContainerlab triggers a Containerlab run for a account.
RunProjectEveNg triggers an EVE-NG lab run for a account.

action.title: up, create, restart, collect, status, down

cleanup.title: for down/restart, remove workdir when true

topologyUrl.title: remote URL (only if netlab supports it)

post.summary: RunProjectNetlab triggers a netlab run for a account.
RunProjectTerraformApply triggers a terraform apply run for a account.
RunProjectTerraformPlan triggers a terraform plan run for a account.

get.summary: GetProjectSecureTrackCatalog returns the embedded SecureTrack check catalog.
GetProjectSecureTrackChecks lists known checks (catalog + embedded .nqe files).

post.summary:
RunProjectSecureTrackCheck executes an embedded check (.nqe) and returns a
normalized response.

get.summary: GetProjectSecureTrackCheck returns the .nqe file content for a given check.

post.summary:
RunProjectSecureTrackNQE executes an NQE query and returns a normalized
response.

get.summary: GetProjectSecureTrackPacks returns the embedded SecureTrack packs definition.

post.summary:
RunProjectSecureTrackPack executes all checks in a pack (serially) and returns
per-check results.

get.summary: GetProjectSecureTrackSnapshots lists snapshots for a Forward network.

put.summary:
UpdateProjectSettings updates account-level feature flags and template repo
sources.

post.summary: SyncProject syncs resources for a single account.

get.summary: GetProjectTerraformTemplates lists Terraform template directories for a account.
ListProjectVariableGroups lists variable groups for a account.

post.summary: CreateProjectVariableGroup creates a variable group for a account.

delete.summary: DeleteProjectVariableGroup deletes a variable group for a account.

put.summary: UpdateProjectVariableGroup updates a variable group for a account.

post.summary: SyncProjectBlueprint syncs a account's blueprint catalog into the repo.
SyncProjects syncs all accounts from external systems (admin only).

get.summary: GetAdminAudit returns audit events (admin only).

get.description: This endpoint is meant for self-diagnosis: it reports the config actually seen by the running API process (including defaults), plus a list of required fields that are missing.
get.summary:
GetAdminEffectiveConfig returns the effective (non-secret) typed Encore config
(admin only).

post.summary: AdminE2ESession seeds a session cookie for CI/E2E flows without external SSO.

post.description:
This is primarily used by \`cmd/e2echeck\` so E2E tests can run without local kubectl access.

NOTE: This does not authenticate to the target device; it only verifies TCP connect and an SSH-like banner prefix ("SSH-").
post.summary:
AdminSSHProbe runs an in-cluster TCP probe to validate SSH reachability of a
list of hosts.

get.summary: ListGovernanceCosts lists cost snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceCosts ingests cost snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: GetGovernancePolicy returns the current governance policy (admin only).

put.summary: UpdateGovernancePolicy updates the governance policy (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceResources lists tracked resources (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceResources ingests resource inventory (admin only).

get.summary: GetGovernanceSummary returns governance summary metrics (admin only).

post.summary: SyncGovernanceSources refreshes inventory from known sources (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceUsage lists usage snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceUsage ingests usage snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: GetAdminImpersonateStatus returns current impersonation status (admin only).

get.description: Data is a short-lived snapshot stored in Redis by Telegraf.
get.summary: ListNodeMetrics returns a lightweight, live view of node metrics (admin only).

get.description: This is intended to answer: "are tasks queued because of real backlog, or because queue event delivery/worker execution is broken?"
get.summary: TaskQueueDiag provides admin diagnostics for the task queue.

post.description: This is an admin-only manual guardrail; the worker also runs an automatic reconciler via cron.

limit.title: Limit caps the number of queued tasks to republish.

post.summary: ReconcileQueuedTasks republishes queue events for tasks stuck in "queued".

post.description: This is an admin-only manual guardrail; the worker also runs an automatic reconciler via cron.

hardMaxRuntimeMinutes.title:
HardMaxRuntimeMinutes marks tasks as failed when they have been running longer
than this.

limit.title: Limit caps the number of running tasks to consider.

maxIdleMinutes.title: MaxIdleMinutes marks tasks as failed when they have had no logs for this long.

post.summary: ReconcileRunningTasks marks tasks that appear stuck in "running" as failed.

post.description: This is intended for development environments where you want to rerun "first-login" bootstrap (Gitea user/provisioning, default account, etc).
post.summary: PurgeUser removes a user and their state (admin only).

get.summary: ListAwsSSOAccounts returns accounts available for the current SSO session.
ListAwsSSORoles returns roles for a selected AWS account.
GetAwsSSOConfig returns the configured AWS SSO start URL and region.

post.summary: LogoutAwsSSO clears any stored AWS SSO tokens.
PollAwsSSO polls for device authorization completion.
StartAwsSSO begins the AWS device authorization flow.

get.summary: GetAwsSSOStatus returns connection status for the authenticated user.
AzurePortalRedirect opens the Azure portal with a login hint.

post.summary: ValidateAwsSSO checks that AWS SSO credentials can mint role credentials.

ListAzureSubscriptions returns available subscriptions for the provided service
principal.
ValidateAzureSP verifies Azure service principal credentials.
ListGCPProjects returns accessible accounts for the provided service account.
ValidateGCPServiceAccount verifies GCP service account JSON by minting a token.

get.summary: DashboardEvents streams a dashboard snapshot as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

get.description: This is a non-streaming companion to \`/api/dashboard/events\` used by the UI to quickly populate state (and during SSE reconnects).
get.summary: DashboardSnapshot returns the latest dashboard snapshot.

post.description: This enables "SSO" without needing to store or reuse the user's password.
post.summary:
DNSBootstrap provisions a per-user Technitium account + zone and stores a
long-lived API token in Skyforge.

get.description:
NOTE: Technitium uses localStorage tokens (not cookies). This endpoint serves a tiny HTML page that:

 1. fetches a token from Skyforge Server
 2. stores it in localStorage
 3. redirects to /dns/
get.summary:
DNSSSO bridges Skyforge auth into Technitium DNS by storing a minted token in
localStorage and redirecting.

get.description: The token is stored client-side (localStorage) by the DNS SSO bridge.
get.summary: DNSToken mints a Technitium session token for the current Skyforge user session.

delete.summary: ClearUserForwardCollector deletes the stored user Forward collector settings.

get.summary:
GetUserForwardCollector returns the authenticated user's Forward collector
settings.

put.summary:
PutUserForwardCollector stores Forward credentials and ensures a per-user
collector exists.

get.summary:
ListUserForwardCollectorConfigs lists Forward collector configurations managed
by Skyforge for the current user.

post.summary:
CreateUserForwardCollectorConfig creates a new Forward collector configuration
and deploys a matching in-cluster collector.

delete.description: It intentionally does NOT delete the Forward-side collector.
delete.summary:
DeleteUserForwardCollectorConfig deletes the in-cluster resources for a
collector config and removes it from Skyforge.

get.summary:
GetUserForwardCollectorConfigLogs returns the collector's `clientd.log` (or a
fallback log) for debugging.

post.summary:
RestartUserForwardCollectorConfig restarts the collector Deployment (best-effort
image update).

get.summary:
GetUserForwardCollectorConfigRuntime returns runtime state for a configured
collector.

GetUserCollectorLogs returns recent log lines from the user's in-cluster
collector pod.

post.description: NOTE: This does not delete any existing collector in Forward; it only updates the Skyforge profile.
post.summary:
ResetUserForwardCollector rotates the user's Forward collector by creating a new
one and storing its authorization key.

post.description: This is used to pull down a newer image when using \`:latest\`.
post.summary:
RestartUserCollector triggers a rolling restart of the user's in-cluster
collector Deployment.

get.summary:
GetUserCollectorRuntime returns the in-cluster runtime status for the user's
collector.

ListForwardCollectors lists collectors visible to the authenticated user's
Forward account.
GCPConsoleRedirect opens the GCP console with a login hint.
GiteaPublicSSO logs into Gitea with a read-only public account.
GetAPIHealth returns a summary of database health.
GetLDAPHealth checks LDAP connectivity.
GetNetlabRuns returns recent Netlab runs for a account.
GetNetlabStats returns basic Netlab server stats for the status dashboard.

get.description:
This endpoint is intended to reduce portal-side polling. It streams a small "snapshot" payload whenever notifications change for the authenticated user.

Query params: - include\_read=true|false (default false) - limit=1..100 (default 50)
get.summary: NotificationsEvents streams notifications as Server-Sent Events (SSE).
OIDCCallback finishes the OIDC flow and issues the Skyforge session cookie.
OIDCLogin starts the Dex OIDC auth flow and stores state/nonce cookies.
ListPKICerts lists issued certificates for the current user.
DownloadPKICert returns the certificate + key bundle for a specific cert.

post.summary: RevokePKICert marks a certificate revoked.
IssuePKICert issues a TLS certificate signed by the Skyforge CA.

get.summary: GetPKIRoot returns the root CA certificate.
ListPKISSHCerts lists issued SSH certificates for the current user.
DownloadPKISSHCert returns the SSH certificate + key bundle for a specific cert.

post.summary: RevokePKISSHCert marks an SSH certificate revoked.
IssuePKISSHCert issues an SSH user certificate signed by the Skyforge SSH CA.

get.summary: GetPKISSHRoot returns the SSH CA public key.
PublicConfig exposes non-sensitive public UI configuration.

get.description: back to the Skyforge login page, preserving the requested next hop.
get.summary:
Reauth clears the current session cookie (and any cached LDAP password) and
redirects

get.description:
Uses Docker Registry HTTP API v2 \`\_catalog\`.

Env: - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_URL (required), e.g. [https://ghcr.io](https://ghcr.io) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_USERNAME / SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_PASSWORD (optional) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_SKIP\_TLS\_VERIFY (optional: true/false) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_REPO\_PREFIXES (optional comma-separated prefixes to include)

Query: - q: substring match filter - n: server-side page size for \_catalog
get.summary: ListRegistryRepos returns available repositories from the configured registry.

ListRegistryTags returns tags for a specific repository from the configured
registry.
GetRuns returns recent runs from native Skyforge tasks.

post.summary: CreateRun is a reserved endpoint for admin-triggered native tasks.
CancelRun cancels a queued or running task.

get.description: This is implemented as a raw endpoint so it can hold a long-lived HTTP connection.
get.summary: RunEvents streams task output as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

get.description: The stream is backed by \`sf\_task\_events\` and supports \`Last-Event-ID\` replay.
get.summary:
TaskLifecycleEvents streams structured task lifecycle events as Server-Sent

SessionForwardAuth is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint used by Traefik
forwardAuth.

head.summary:
SessionForwardAuthHead is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint used by
Traefik forwardAuth (HEAD).

get.description:
It behaves like SessionForwardAuth on success, but on unauthenticated requests it returns a 302 redirect to Skyforge login, preserving the original request URI via the \`next\` parameter.

NOTE: Envoy's ext\_authz filter commonly forwards the original request path in \`x-envoy-original-path\` (preferred) rather than \`x-forwarded-uri\`.
get.summary: SessionForwardAuthEnvoy is a Skyforge SSO gate endpoint for Envoy ext_authz.

get.description: configured prefix (e.g. \`/api/session/forwardauth/envoy/\`), so we also expose wildcard handlers.

NOTE: Envoy's ext_authz `path_prefix` can append the original request path to
the
ListSnmpTrapEvents returns the current user's trap inbox.

FrontendAssets serves hashed frontend assets built by Vite.
FrontendDashboard serves the SPA for dashboard routes.
PlatformHealth serves the platform health payload.
FrontendDesign serves the SPA design sandbox route.
FrontendDocs serves embedded UI docs pages.
FrontendFavicon serves the SPA favicon (and compatibility icon paths).
CheckAll performs a comprehensive health check of all system components.
Check is a simple health check helper that verifies the application is running.

post.description:
Example:

	POST https://<hostname>/hooks/<token>/github
post.summary: WebhookIngestAny receives webhook events via tokenized URLs.

get.summary: FrontendIndex serves the SPA entrypoint.

post.description: This is used to build a lightweight "live node metrics" view without deploying a full monitoring stack. Data is stored as a short-lived snapshot in Redis.
post.summary:
IngestNodeMetric accepts host/node metrics from in-cluster collectors
(Telegraf).

post.description: Expected payload is Telegraf JSON serializer output for \`inputs.snmp\_trap\`.
post.summary: IngestSNMPTrap accepts SNMP trap events from in-cluster collectors (Telegraf).

post.description: This endpoint is intentionally unauthenticated (SSO) and guarded by an internal token header.
post.summary:
IngestSyslog accepts syslog events from in-cluster collectors (Vector/Fluent
Bit/etc).
CronCloudCredentialChecksBridge triggers cloud credential checks maintenance.
CronUserSyncBridge triggers user sync maintenance.
CronWorkerHeartbeatBridge triggers the worker heartbeat task.

CronProcessQueuedTasksFallbackBridge triggers DB-backed fallback processing for
queued tasks.
CronReconcileQueuedTasksBridge triggers reconciliation for queued tasks.
CronReconcileRunningTasksBridge triggers reconciliation for running tasks.

post.description: This is used to detect whether any worker pods are alive when tasks are queued.
post.summary: CronWorkerHeartbeat upserts a task worker heartbeat for this worker instance.

post.description:
appear stuck in "queued".

This avoids the "queued forever" failure mode when Pub/Sub delivery is delayed/unavailable. The primary mechanism is still Pub/Sub; this only kicks in after a minimum queued age.
post.summary:
CronProcessQueuedTasksFallback is a DB-backed fallback that starts tasks
directly when they

CronReconcileQueuedTasks republishes queue events for tasks stuck in the
"queued" state.

CronReconcileRunningTasks finds long-running tasks that appear stuck and marks
them failed.

get.summary:
LogoutAll clears the Skyforge cookie and redirects to the landing page (used for
manual "reset").
FrontendManifest serves the PWA manifest.

NautobotLogout clears the Skyforge session cookie and redirects to the Skyforge
landing page.
NautobotLogoutAny handles `/nautobot/logout/*` (including a trailing slash).

NetboxLogout clears the Skyforge session cookie and redirects to the Skyforge
landing page.
NetboxLogoutAny handles `/netbox/logout/*` (including a trailing slash).
FrontendNotifications serves the SPA notifications page.

post.summary: CreateNotification creates a new notification.

get.summary: GetUserNotifications retrieves notifications for a specific user.

put.summary: MarkAllNotificationsAsRead marks all notifications for a user as read.

delete.summary: DeleteNotification deletes a notification.

put.summary: MarkNotificationAsRead marks a notification as read.

get.summary: FrontendRobots serves robots.txt.
FrontendSNMP serves the SPA for SNMP routes.
FrontendStatus serves the SPA status page.

get.description: This is designed for an unauthenticated landing page and must not leak user/account identifiers.
get.summary: StatusSummary returns a public, safe platform status summary.

get.description: This endpoint is public and intended to remove portal-side polling on the status page.
get.summary:
StatusSummaryEvents streams the platform status summary as Server-Sent Events
(SSE).

get.summary: List returns all objects in the bucket.

get.summary: ReadFile downloads a file from storage.

get.summary: SwaggerOpenAPI serves the OpenAPI schema.

GetPublicNotificationSettings retrieves notification settings for authenticated
users.

get.description: Skyforge uses username-based identities, so \`id\` is the username.
